gameplay.description: Gameplay mechanics or behaviors requested (e.g., player movement, enemy spawn).

ui.description: UI or HUD requirements (score text, pause menu, etc.).

assets.description: Objects, sprites, audio, or layout assets that must exist.

visual_style.description: Visual style specification for placeholder assets (optional, defaults to flat colored shapes).

palette.description: Color names or hex codes for the visual theme (e.g., ['red', 'blue', '#FFD700']).

shape_language.description: Shape style: geometric (sharp), rounded (soft edges), pixel (retro).

open_questions.description: Ambiguities or missing info that block generation.

assumptions.description: Documented assumptions when clarification is unavailable.
